articles.description: Jordan Capps scored 12 of his 18 points in the first half as Southeastern Louisiana built a 23-point halftime advantage and cruised to a 71-64 victory over New Orleans on Wednesday night.
articles.headline: SE Louisiana uses big first half, beats New Orleans 71-64

articles.description: Shannon Bogues scored 32 points and Stephen F. Austin cruised to an 87-68 win over Texas A&M-Corpus Christi on Wednesday night.
articles.headline: Stephen F. Austin cruises to 87-68 win over Texas A&M-CC
No. 9 Gonzaga hosts mismatched Loyola Marymount

articles.description: No. 3 Villanova has thrived on the 3 during its dominating Big East run, but the triple abandoned the Wildcats again in Wednesday's loss to Providence.
articles.headline: 3-point shooting woes lead to No. 3 Villanova's second loss in three games

images.caption: Mikal Bridges scored 19 points for Villanova on Wednesday, but a lack of 3-point support doomed the Wildcats.
images.name: Mikal Bridges & Alpha Diallo [576x324]
